title.narrative: Shanxi Coal Bed Methane Development and Utilization

description.narrative: The revised PDO of the project is to increase production of coal bed methane to reduce GHGs associated with coal combustion in the project area.

participating-org.narrative: International Bank for Reconstruction and Development
International Bank for Reconstruction and Development
Shanxi Coal Bed Methane Company Ltd. (SCBMC)

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :LA 5.01 | Description :The Effectiveness Deadline is the date ninety (90) days after the date of this Agreement| Due Date :30-Sep-2009
Finance Agreement :LA Schedule 2, Section IV.B 1.(b) | Description :Withdrawal conditions: signed SLA and legal opinion | Due Date:31-Dec-2012
Finance Agreement :PA Annex A, Para 12 | Description :A minimum debt service coverage ratio of 1.4 | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :PA Annex A, Para 14 | Description :An annual rate of return on equity is not less than 9% | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :PA Schedule Section II | Description :Project reporting | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :PA Schedule, Para 2-5 | Description :The implementation will comply with the agreed Resettlement, enviornmentprotection and CBM and LNG Safety measures. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :PA Schedule, Para 6 | Description :The Subsidiary loan agreement contains the principal terms set forth inparagraphs 1 through 4, and under conditions set forth in paragraphs 5 through 15 of the Annex | Due Date :31-Mar-2010
